title: The relationship between short-form video use and depression among Chinese adolescents: Examining the mediating roles of need gratification and short-form video addiction
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Chengwei Zhu, Yiru Jiang, Hanning Lei, Haitao Wang, Cai Zhang
